description:
Delivering unmatched advocacy and support to innocent accident victims and their families throughout Buncombe County and across Western North Carolina from our law office in Asheville, the top-rated, award-winning attorneys at the Lanier Law Group P.A. are ready to step in the ring and fight hard on your behalf to help increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve.

With a history that dates back to 1997, our law firm has served the residents of North Carolina for more than 23 years who have serious personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from car, truck and motorcycle accidents; workplace accidents; medical malpractice; defective products; unsafe property conditions; sexual assault; and other preventable tragedies. We also handle workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, and to date, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include 11 total offices across the state, and our attorneys have earned designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America' Top 100 High Stakes Litigators as well as many other accolades from our peers. In addition, we have also received countless positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients for our superior client service and unwavering commitment to their needs.

To improve the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need following a debilitating injury or devastating loss caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. to schedule a free evaluation of your claim. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe in today's uncertain environment.
